CustomField.formula: IF( (IF( ISPICKVAL(RTL_Data_Quality__c, "Pass") , 33, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL(RTL_Data_Age__c, "Pass") , 33, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL(RTL_Marketing_Messages__c, "Pass") , 33, 0))=99 , 100 , IF( ISPICKVAL(RTL_Data_Quality__c, "Pass") , 33, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL(RTL_Data_Age__c, "Pass") , 33, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL(RTL_Marketing_Messages__c, "Pass") , 33, 0) )
CustomField.label: Overall Quality
